contrib/sha1/sha1.h

00001 /*
00002  *  sha1.h
00003  *
00004  *  Copyright (C) 1998, 2009
00005  *  Paul E. Jones <paulej@packetizer.com>
00006  *  All Rights Reserved
00007  *
00008  *****************************************************************************
00009  *  $Id: sha1.h 12 2009-06-22 19:34:25Z paulej $
00010  *****************************************************************************
00011  *
00012  *  Description:
00013  *      This class implements the Secure Hashing Standard as defined
00014  *      in FIPS PUB 180-1 published April 17, 1995.
00015  *
00016  *      Many of the variable names in the SHA1Context, especially the
00017  *      single character names, were used because those were the names
00018  *      used in the publication.
00019  *
00020  *      Please read the file sha1.c for more information.
00021  *
00022  */
00023 
00024 #ifndef _SHA1_H_
00025 #define _SHA1_H_
00026 
00027 /* 
00028  *  This structure will hold context information for the hashing
00029  *  operation
00030  */
00031 typedef struct SHA1Context
00032 {
00033     unsigned Message_Digest[5]; /* Message Digest (output)          */
00034 
00035     unsigned Length_Low;        /* Message length in bits           */
00036     unsigned Length_High;       /* Message length in bits           */
00037 
00038     unsigned char Message_Block[64]; /* 512-bit message blocks      */
00039     int Message_Block_Index;    /* Index into message block array   */
00040 
00041     int Computed;               /* Is the digest computed?          */
00042     int Corrupted;              /* Is the message digest corruped?  */
00043 } SHA1Context;
00044 
00045 /*
00046  *  Function Prototypes
00047  */
00048 void SHA1Reset(SHA1Context *);
00049 int SHA1Result(SHA1Context *);
00050 void SHA1Input( SHA1Context *,
00051                 const unsigned char *,
00052                 unsigned);
00053 
00054 #endif
